meanings.definition: Feelings of embarrassment or annoyance caused by failure or disappointment.
meanings.sent1: Her chagrins were evident when she dropped her books in the hallway.
meanings.sent2: His chagrins were clear after he missed the winning shot.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's chagrins were visible when it tripped over its own tail.
meanings.sent4: The chagrins of defeat weighed heavily on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The chagrins of the failed experiment lingered in the air.
